messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Chicken Pox--we got it! If you want to expose your child, let me know!
messages.msgSnippet: wish we were closer.  thanks anyway.  Wendy ... From: Jill McCracken  Subject: [unschoolingbasics] Chicken Pox--we got it! If you
messages.messageBody:
wish we were closer.  thanks anyway.  Wendy

--- On Tue, 4/21/09, Jill McCracken <mccracken.jill@...> wrote:

From: Jill McCracken <mccracken.jill@...>
Subject: [unschoolingbasics] Chicken Pox--we got it! If you want to expose your child, let me know!
To: StPeteWorkingMoms@yahoogroups.com, unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Date: Tuesday, April 21, 2009, 11:33 AM








Hi all,
May be a strange post, but I wanted to let you all know that we have the
chicken pox, or at least my son Nathaniel does. He was not vaccinated and
has a mild case. I know some people may want to expose their children to it
so they can get it over with before they get much older. If you'd like to
expose your child, let me know and we can make arrangements to let them hang
out. He's already starting to crust over with some and isn't developing many
more--the doctor says its a pretty mild case. But it should still be
sufficient for him to develop the antibodies. Anyway, let me know. And feel
free to forward to other local lists.
Best,
Jill

--
Jill McCracken, PhD
Assistant Professor
Division of Languages, Literature, and Writing
University of South Florida St. Petersburg
140 7th Avenue South, DAV 120
St. Petersburg, FL 33701
phone: 727.873.4740
fax: 727.873.4526

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Chicken Pox--we got it! If you want to expose your child, let me know!
messages.msgSnippet: LOL my mom exposed me and I never had a noticeable case but am immune. So it does work. Beth Sent from my Verizon Wireless BlackBerry ... From: Jill McCracken
messages.messageBody:
LOL my mom exposed me and I never had a noticeable case but am immune. So it does work.
Beth
Sent from my Verizon Wireless BlackBerry
